divs: Sighting DetailsIt was almost 7:30 and I was waiting for my friends to show up so we could go egg houses. I walked outside on my front porch and looked out toward the local mountain ranges. To my suprise I saw something, at first I was taken back by it, I was always a believer in UFO's but I never thought I would see one myself. It was a large, elongated triangle, with lights on the bottom. It blacked out the sky behind it. At first it was just slowly moving, hovering over the mountains. I went inside to try and find a camera and tell someone, my camera had dead batteries and no one ever believed me. When I came back outside, the UFO had turned almost completely vertical toward the sky, I went back inside to tell my father, since he just got out of the shower and was the only one who could possibly believe me. But when I went to show him, it was gone. I've included a sketch, of when it turned toward the sky.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Lakeside
There were no other sightings in Lakeside on or around October 31st 2006
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: On Halloween night when I was a teenager I walked outside and saw a triangular UFO in the sky
